attributes.action: Ban anti bullying policies and have a yearly school inspection by an independent agency just for bullying
attributes.additional_details:
Children do get bullied because some schools fob parents off with excuses "we don't tolerate bullying here etc"instead of helping the child who is being bullied.
How many parents have moved their children out of a school because they were bullied , not listened to and no one investigated why they had to move their children.
I would like the goverment to have an independent anti bullying agency to inspect schools once a year and take on individual cases of bullying so someone is helping the child who is being bullied.
